title: 7 HOF's Cobb, Young, Lajoie, Johnson, more. Moved to ebay.
author: JollyRoger

posts.post_title: 7 HOF's Cobb, Young, Lajoie, Johnson, more. Moved to ebay.
posts.post_content:
-Ty Cobb, red background- Polar Bear BVG 1 [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Ty-Cobb-Red-Portrait-BVG-1-Polar-Bear-HOF-Free-Shipping-/152383375743?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]

-Cy Young, portrait- El Principe DE Gales BVG A [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Cy-Young-Portrait-BVG-A-EPDG-El-Principe-De-Gales-LOW-POP-HOF-/152383391280?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]

-Christy Mathewson, white cap, small "P" backstamp- Piedmont 150 SGC 20   *SOLD*

-Walter Johnson, pitching- Piedmont 350 GAI 2 [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Walter-Johnson-Pitching-GAI-2-Good-HOF-Free-Shipping-/152383403872?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]

-Miller Huggins, portrait- Cycle 350 PSA 3 [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Miller-Huggins-Portrait-PSA-3-VG-HOF-Free-Shipping-/152383435672?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]

-Nap Lajoie, portrait- Piedmont 150 PSA 2 [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Nap-Lajoie-Portrait-PSA-2-Good-HOF-Free-Shipping-/152384997355?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]

-Joe Tinker, bat off- Polar Bear PSA 4 [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Joe-Tinker-Bat-Off-PSA-4-VG-EX-HOF-Free-Shipping-/152383413026?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]

-Sam Crawford, throwing- Piedmont 350 GAI 3 [url]http://m.ebay.com/itm/1909-T206-Sam-Crawford-Throwing-GAI-3-Very-Good-First-Graded-HOF-Ships-free-/152384988453?nav=SELLING_ACTIVE[/url]
Had lots of members asking about breaking up the group, so I've priced them individually now. Thanks for your interest guys!
